member.name: T:AccessFuncs.AccessType
member.summary: This enumeration contains a list of common constants used to interact with the Windows Accessibility features.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_GETHIGHCONTRAST
member.summary: Gets the high contrast information using the HIGHCONTRAST data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_SETHIGHCONTRAST
member.summary: Sets the high contrast information using the HIGHCONTRAST data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_GETSCREENREADER
member.summary: Gets the screen readers status. Unlike some other accessibility settings, this one relies on a BOOL, rather than a data structure for input.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_SETSCREENREADER
member.summary: Sets the screen readers status. Unlike some other accessibility settings, this one relies on a BOOL, rather than a data structure for input.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_GETFILTERKEYS
member.summary: Gets the FilterKeys information using the FILTERKEYS data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_SETFILTERKEYS
member.summary: Sets the FilterKeys information using the FILTERKEYS data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_GETTOGGLEKEYS
member.summary: Gets the ToggleKeys information using the TOGGLEKEYS data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_SETTOGGLEKEYS
member.summary: Sets the ToggleKeys information using the TOGGLEKEYS data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_GETMOUSEKEYS
member.summary: Gets the MouseKeys information using the MOUSEKEYS data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_SETMOUSEKEYS
member.summary: Sets the MouseKeys information using the MOUSEKEYS data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_GETSHOWSOUNDS
member.summary: Gets the ShowSounds status. Unlike some other accessibility settings, this one relies on a BOOL, rather than a data structure for input. Microsoft recommends using the GetSystemMetrics(SM_SHOWSOUNDS) function in place of this call.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_SETSHOWSOUNDS
member.summary: Sets the ShowSounds status. Unlike some other accessibility settings, this one relies on a BOOL, rather than a data structure for input. Microsoft recommends using the GetSystemMetrics(SM_SHOWSOUNDS) function in place of this call.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_GETSTICKYKEYS
member.summary: Gets the StickyKeys information using the STICKYKEYS data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_SETSTICKYKEYS
member.summary: Sets the StickyKeys information using the STICKYKEYS data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_GETACCESSTIMEOUT
member.summary: Gets the Windows Accessibility Timeout information using the ACCESSTIMEOUT data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_SETACCESSTIMEOUT
member.summary: Sets the Windows Accessibility Timeout information using the ACCESSTIMEOUT data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_GETSERIALKEYS
member.summary: Gets the SerialKeys information using the SERIALKEYS data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_SETSERIALKEYS
member.summary: Sets the SerialKeys information using the SERIALKEYS data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_GETSOUNDSENTRY
member.summary: Gets the SoundSentry information using the SOUNDSENTRY data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessType.SPI_SETSOUNDSENTRY
member.summary: Gets the SoundSentry information using the SOUNDSENTRY data structure.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.WinIniFlags
member.summary: This enumeration contains the flags used to control update of the user profile. Select SPIF_NONE if the application does not need to update the profile.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.WinIniFlags.SPIF_NONE
member.summary: Doesn't perform any type of profile update.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.WinIniFlags.SPIF_UPDATEINIFILE
member.summary: Writes the update to the user profile.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.WinIniFlags.SPIF_SENDWININICHANGE
member.summary: Writes the update to the user profile and broadcasts the WM_SETTINGCHANGE message.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.WinIniFlags.SPIF_SENDCHANGE
member.summary: Writes the update to the user profile and broadcasts the WM_SETTINGCHANGE message.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.HighContrastFlags
member.summary: A listing of HighContrast accessibility flags.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.HighContrastFlags.HCF_HIGHCONTRASTON
member.summary: HighContrast is On

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.HighContrastFlags.HCF_AVAILABLE
member.summary: HighContrast is available for use.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.HighContrastFlags.HCF_HOTKEYACTIVE
member.summary: HighContrast has the hot key selected.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.HighContrastFlags.HCF_CONFIRMHOTKEY
member.summary: Confirmation dialog box displayed for the HighContrast hot key.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.HighContrastFlags.HCF_HOTKEYSOUND
member.summary: Make a sound when HighContrast is selected.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.HighContrastFlags.HCF_INDICATOR
member.summary: Display an indicator when HighContrast is selected.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.HighContrastFlags.HCF_HOTKEYAVAILABLE
member.summary: HighContrast hot key is available.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.FilterKeysFlags
member.summary: A listing of FilterKeys accessibility flags.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FilterKeysFlags.FKF_FILTERKEYSON
member.summary: FilterKeys is On

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FilterKeysFlags.FKF_AVAILABLE
member.summary: FilterKeys is available for use.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FilterKeysFlags.FKF_HOTKEYACTIVE
member.summary: The FilterKeys hotkey is active.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FilterKeysFlags.FKF_CONFIRMHOTKEY
member.summary: Confirmation dialog box displayed for the FilterKeys hot key.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FilterKeysFlags.FKF_HOTKEYSOUND
member.summary: Make a sound when changing the FilterKeys status.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FilterKeysFlags.FKF_INDICATOR
member.summary: Display an indicator when changing the FilterKeys status.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FilterKeysFlags.FKF_CLICKON
member.summary: The FilterKeys click is set to on.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.ToggleKeysFlags
member.summary: A listing of ToggleKeys accessibility flags.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.ToggleKeysFlags.TKF_TOGGLEKEYSON
member.summary: ToggleKeys is On

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.ToggleKeysFlags.TKF_AVAILABLE
member.summary: ToggleKeys is available for use.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.ToggleKeysFlags.TKF_HOTKEYACTIVE
member.summary: The ToggleKeys hotkey is active.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.ToggleKeysFlags.TKF_CONFIRMHOTKEY
member.summary: Confirmation dialog box displayed for the ToggleKeys hot key.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.ToggleKeysFlags.TKF_HOTKEYSOUND
member.summary: Make a sound when changing the ToggleKeys status.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.ToggleKeysFlags.TKF_INDICATOR
member.summary: Display an indicator when changing the ToggleKeys status.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags
member.summary: A listing of MouseKeys accessibility flags.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_MOUSEKEYSON
member.summary: MouseKeys is On

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_AVAILABLE
member.summary: MouseKeys is available for use.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_HOTKEYACTIVE
member.summary: The MouseKeys hotkey is active.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_CONFIRMHOTKEY
member.summary: Confirmation dialog box displayed for the MouseKeys hot key.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_HOTKEYSOUND
member.summary: Make a sound when changing the MouseKeys status.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_INDICATOR
member.summary: Display an indicator when changing the MouseKeys status.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_MODIFIERS
member.summary: Use the Ctrl key to speed the mouse up and the Shift key to slow the mouse down.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_REPLACENUMBERS
member.summary: The numeric keypad moves the mouse when Num Lock is on when set.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_LEFTBUTTONSEL
member.summary: The user wants to use the left button to select.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_RIGHTBUTTONSEL
member.summary: The user wants to use the right button to select.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_LEFTBUTTONDOWN
member.summary: The left button to down.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_RIGHTBUTTONDOWN
member.summary: The right button to down.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MouseKeysFlags.MKF_MOUSEMODE
member.summary: The system is processing numeric keypad input as mouse movement.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags
member.summary: A listing of StickyKeys accessibility flags.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_STICKYKEYSON
member.summary: StickyKeys is On

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_AVAILABLE
member.summary: StickyKeys is available for use.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_HOTKEYACTIVE
member.summary: The StickyKeys hotkey is active.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_CONFIRMHOTKEY
member.summary: Confirmation dialog box displayed for the StickyKeys hot key.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_HOTKEYSOUND
member.summary: Make a sound when changing the StickyKeys status.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_INDICATOR
member.summary: Display an indicator when changing the StickyKeys status.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_AUDIBLEFEEDBACK
member.summary: The system plays a sound when the control keys change status.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_TRISTATE
member.summary: Pressing a key twice locks it--a third time releases it.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_TWOKEYSOFF
member.summary: Pressing a control and another key together turns of StickyKeys.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_LALTLATCHED
member.summary: The left Alt key is latched.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_LCTLLATCHED
member.summary: The left Ctrl key is latched.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_LSHIFTLATCHED
member.summary: The left Shift key is latched.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_RALTLATCHED
member.summary: The right Alt key is latched.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_RCTLLATCHED
member.summary: The right Ctrl key is latched.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_RSHIFTLATCHED
member.summary: The right Shift key is latched.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_LWINLATCHED
member.summary: The left Windows key is latched.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_RWINLATCHED
member.summary: The right Windows key is latched.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_LALTLOCKED
member.summary: The left Alt key is locked.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_LCTLLOCKED
member.summary: The left Ctrl key is locked.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_LSHIFTLOCKED
member.summary: The left Shift key is locked.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_RALTLOCKED
member.summary: The right Alt key is locked.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_RCTLLOCKED
member.summary: The right Ctrl key is locked.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_RSHIFTLOCKED
member.summary: The right Shift key is locked.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_LWINLOCKED
member.summary: The left Windows key is locked.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.StickyKeysFlags.SKF_RWINLOCKED
member.summary: The right Windows key is locked.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.AccessTimeoutFlags
member.summary: A listing of Windows Accessibility timeout flags.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessTimeoutFlags.ATF_TIMEOUTON
member.summary: If this flag is set, the user has set a timeout value and the Windows Accessibility features will turn off after a given time period. If this flag is cleared, the Windows Accessibility features are always available.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.AccessTimeoutFlags.ATF_ONOFFFEEDBACK
member.summary: Make a sound when changing the timeout status.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.SerialKeysFlags
member.summary: A listing of SerialKeys accessibility flags.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SerialKeysFlags.SERKF_SERIALKEYSON
member.summary: SerialKeys is On

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SerialKeysFlags.SERKF_AVAILABLE
member.summary: SerialKeys is available for use. This flag is not implemented

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SerialKeysFlags.SERKF_INDICATOR
member.summary: Display an indicator when changing the SerialKeys status.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryFlags
member.summary: A listing of SoundSentry accessibility flags.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryFlags.SSF_SOUNDSENTRYON
member.summary: SoundSentry is On

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryFlags.SSF_AVAILABLE
member.summary: SoundSentry is available for use. This flag is not implemented

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryFlags.SSF_INDICATOR
member.summary: Display an indicator when changing the SoundSentry status.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryTextEffects
member.summary: Contains a list of the possible screen effects for a full screen DOS text mode application.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryTextEffects.SSTF_NONE
member.summary: Don't display an effect.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryTextEffects.SSTF_CHARS
member.summary: Flash the characters in the corner of the screen.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryTextEffects.SSTF_BORDER
member.summary: Flash the border (overscan area) of the screen.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryTextEffects.SSTF_DISPLAY
member.summary: Flash the entire screen.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryGraphicEffects
member.summary: Contains a list of the possible screen effects for a full screen DOS graphics mode application.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryGraphicEffects.SSGF_NONE
member.summary: Don't display an effect.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryGraphicEffects.SSGF_DISPLAY
member.summary: Flash the entire screen.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryWindowsEffects
member.summary: Contains a list of the possible screen effects for a Windows application.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryWindowsEffects.SSWF_NONE
member.summary: Don't display an effect.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryWindowsEffects.SSWF_TITLE
member.summary: Flash the title bar of the active application.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryWindowsEffects.SSWF_WINDOW
member.summary: Flash the entire active application window.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryWindowsEffects.SSWF_DISPLAY
member.summary: Flash the entire screen.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SoundSentryWindowsEffects.SSWF_CUSTOM
member.summary: Use the custom flashing method specified by the SoundSentryProc() function found in the DLL specified by the iFSWindowsEffectDLL member.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.HIGHCONTRAST
member.summary: Contains the HighContrast accessibility setting information.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.HIGHCONTRAST.cbSize
member.summary: Contains the size of the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.HIGHCONTRAST.dwFlags
member.summary: Contains the settings flags for the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.HIGHCONTRAST.lpszDefaultScheme
member.summary: Contains a text description of the current scheme.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.FILTERKEYS
member.summary: Contains the FilterKeys accessibility setting information.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FILTERKEYS.cbSize
member.summary: Contains the size of the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FILTERKEYS.dwFlags
member.summary: Contains the settings flags for the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FILTERKEYS.iWaitMSec
member.summary: Defines the Acceptance Delay value.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FILTERKEYS.iDelayMSec
member.summary: Defines the Delay Until Repeat value.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FILTERKEYS.iRepeatMSec
member.summary: Defines the Repeat Rate value.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.FILTERKEYS.iBounceMSec
member.summary: Defines the Debounce Time value.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.TOGGLEKEYS
member.summary: Contains the ToggleKeys accessibility setting information.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.TOGGLEKEYS.cbSize
member.summary: Contains the size of the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.TOGGLEKEYS.dwFlags
member.summary: Contains the settings flags for the data structure.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.MOUSEKEYS
member.summary: Contains the MouseKeys accessibility setting information.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MOUSEKEYS.cbSize
member.summary: Contains the size of the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MOUSEKEYS.dwFlags
member.summary: Contains the settings flags for the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MOUSEKEYS.iMaxSpeed
member.summary: Contains the maximum speed setting of the mouse.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MOUSEKEYS.iTimeToMaxSpeed
member.summary: Contains the acceleration setting of the mouse.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MOUSEKEYS.iCtrlSpeed
member.summary: Contains the control speed setting of the mouse. Ignored if MKF_MODIFIERS is not set.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MOUSEKEYS.dwReserved1
member.summary: Reserved--Do Not Use

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.MOUSEKEYS.dwReserved2
member.summary: Reserved--Do Not Use

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.STICKYKEYS
member.summary: Contains the StickyKeys accessibility setting information.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.STICKYKEYS.cbSize
member.summary: Contains the size of the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.STICKYKEYS.dwFlags
member.summary: Contains the settings flags for the data structure.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.ACCESSTIMEOUT
member.summary: Contains the Windows Accessibility timeout setting information.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.ACCESSTIMEOUT.cbSize
member.summary: Contains the size of the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.ACCESSTIMEOUT.dwFlags
member.summary: Contains the settings flags for the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.ACCESSTIMEOUT.iTimeOutMSec
member.summary: Contains the timeout value for automatic shutdown in ms.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.SERIALKEYS
member.summary: Contains the SerialKeys accessibility setting information.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SERIALKEYS.cbSize
member.summary: Contains the size of the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SERIALKEYS.dwFlags
member.summary: Contains the settings flags for the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SERIALKEYS.lpszActivePort
member.summary: Provides the name of the port used to receive serial communications. If there is no port in use, this member is zero. If the port is set to scan all inputs, then this value returns AUTO.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SERIALKEYS.lpszPort
member.summary: Reserved--Do Not Use

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SERIALKEYS.iBaudRate
member.summary: Contains the SerialKeys baud rate setting.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SERIALKEYS.iPortState
member.summary: Contains a number that indicates the current port state. 0 = All input ignored, 1 = Input is watched for SerialKeys activation when no other application has the port open, 2 = All input is treated as SerialKeys commands.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SERIALKEYS.iActive
member.summary: Contains the number of the active port.

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY
member.summary: Contains the SoundSentry accessibility setting information.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.cbSize
member.summary: Contains the size of the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.dwFlags
member.summary: Contains the settings flags for the data structure.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.iFSTextEffect
member.summary: Determines the type of text effect used to display information on screen. Use with the SoundSentryTextEffects enumeration.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.iFSTextEffectMSec
member.summary: Determines the duration of the text screen effect in ms.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.iFSTextEffectColorBits
member.summary: Determines the RGB color used to display a text screen effect.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.iFSGrafEffect
member.summary: Determines the type of graphic effect used to display information on screen. Use with the SoundSentryGraphicEffects enumeration.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.iFSGrafEffectMSec
member.summary: Determines the duration of the graphics screen effect in ms.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.iFSGrafEffectColor
member.summary: Determines the RGB color used to display a graphics screen effect.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.iWindowsEffect
member.summary: Determines the type of Windows application effect used to display information on screen. Use with the SoundSentryWindowsEffects enumeration.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.iWindowsEffectMSec
member.summary: Determines the duration of the Windows application screen effect in ms.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.lpszWindowsEffectDLL
member.summary: Defines the name of the DLL that contains the SoundSentryProc callback function. This member contains NULL if no DLL is used.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.SOUNDSENTRY.iWindowsEffectOrdinal
member.summary: Reserved--Do Not Use

member.name: T:AccessFuncs.Accessible
member.summary: This class contains the functions required to work with the Windows Accessibility features.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.Accessible.MAX_PATH
member.summary: This constant contains the maximum path length used by Windows.

member.name: F:AccessFuncs.Accessible.SM_SHOWSOUNDS
member.summary: This is the constant used to obtain information about ShowSounds using the GetSystemMetrics() function.

member.name: M:AccessFuncs.Accessible.#ctor
member.summary: Accessible class constructor.

member.name: M:AccessFuncs.Accessible.SystemParametersInfo(AccessFuncs.AccessType,System.UInt32,System.IntPtr,AccessFuncs.WinIniFlags)
member.summary: This function gets or sets the Windows Accessibility setting selected by uiAction. It can optionally update the user profile to match the new settings.
member.param: The AccessType enumeration member that reflects the accessibility option you want to modify.
The actual size of the data structure.
A pointer to the local copy of the data structure.
One of the WinIniFlag values that reflects the user profile update status.
member.returns: True if the call is successful.

member.name: M:AccessFuncs.Accessible.GetSystemMetrics(System.Int32)
member.summary: The GetSystemMatrics function can retrieve a variety of system metrics information, along with some types of system configuration information.
member.param: The index of the metric to retrieve.
member.returns: A number indicating the value of the metric.
